content:
Keith Boaz director of JQH Arena Plaster Sports Complex and Hammons Student Center received the Patriot Award on Nov PERIOD  during the Veterans Appreciation Breakfast PERIOD

The award was created by the Employer Support of the Guard and Reserve which is an agency of the Department of Defense PERIOD

Boaz was nominated for being highly supportive of the militarys Reserve service PERIOD
